TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Khpan, title = Khpan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khpan} }

S.FORM: Khpan Itiniay i Fuxing Cen no Taoyuan ko Khpan a niyaro', 30 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 91 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 88% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 80 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 12% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 75%, Amis 3%, roma 10%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Khpan Itiniay i Foxing Cen no Taoyoan ko Khpan a niyaro', 30 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 91 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 88% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 80 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 12% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 75%, Amis 3%, roma 10%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
